title: Sophia Santi vs. Justin Slayer - Interracial Porn XXX
description:
Sophia Santi vs. Justin Slayer in Black Addicktion

Sophia Santi (born December 6, 1981), formerly known as Natalia Cruze, is a Canadian pornographic actress and director

Santi was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba, but she grew up in Vancouver, British Columbia. At age 18, she moved to her mother's home state of Arizona, and, at age 20, she moved to Los Angeles, California.[2] She has said that her father is Romanian, with Gypsy and Mongolian ancestry, and that her mother is of Black, Irish, German & Cherokee descent. She describes herself as a tomboy when she was young, saying "I have sprained each of my ankles eight to twelve times each and have torn five ligaments", resulting her having difficulty in wearing heels. During high school, she worked as a gourmet pizza chef, and, afterwards, she attended a trade school to become an esthetician

Santi began modeling at the age of 14. She started working as an adult model under the name Natalia Cruze, becoming the Penthouse Pet of the month for November 2002 and Penthouse Pet of the Year runner-up for 2005. She started appearing in adult films in 2003. She appeared on the Howard Stern show in January 2005.

In 2005, she signed an exclusive contract with the porn studio Digital Playground. At that time, she also changed her stage name to Sophia Santi and trademarked it, stating that she did not own the website NataliaCruz.com and that she didn't want the person that owned that site to capitalize on all the marketing that Digital Playground was doing for her.

At the age of 18, Santi got a very large tattoo of a Japanese dragon, which covers most of her back and left side. Santi is interested in both natural medicine and spirituality. She is a devotee of Ayurvedic and Tantric philosophies. She has described herself as bisexual.
